original_text: Then he had another dream, and he told it to his brothers. “Listen,” he said, “I had another dream, and this time the sun and moon and eleven stars were bowing down to me.”
korean_text: 요셉이 다시 꿈을 꾸고 그의 형들에게 말하여 이르되 내가 또 꿈을 꾼즉 해와 달과 열한 별이 내게 절하더이다 하니라

sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 또 다른 꿈을 꾸었고

sentences.original_text: and he told it to his brothers
and this time the sun and moon and eleven stars
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이번에는 해와 달과 열한 별들이
